test_metadata.methodology: API key requirement analysis via SKILL.md documentation + runtime testing + web research

12306.test_output: Error: Failed to connect to MCP server: [Errno 32] Broken pipe
12306.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 15 explicitly states: 'API Key: Not required'
12306.notes: No API key needed. Uses public 12306.cn API. MCP server requires Node.js installation via npx. China mainland railway network only.

airbnb.test_output: Disallowed by Airbnb's robots.txt. Server suggests enabling 'ignore_robots_txt' flag.
airbnb.documentation_analysis: No API key requirement mentioned in SKILL.md. Uses web scraping via @openbnb/mcp-server-airbnb
airbnb.notes: No API key needed. Works via web scraping. May be blocked by robots.txt. Use '--ignore-robots-txt' server arg if needed for testing. Legal/ethical considerations apply.

amadeus-flight.test_command: python3 scripts/search.py get_flights JFK LAX 2026-02-15 null 1 false
amadeus-flight.test_output: Error: invalid literal for int() with base 10: 'null'
amadeus-flight.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 15 states: 'API Key: Requires AMADEUS_API_KEY and AMADEUS_API_SECRET environment variables'
amadeus-flight.notes: Requires both API key and secret. Free tier available with same monthly quota in test and production. Register at Amadeus for Developers portal. Create account > My Self-Service Workspace > Create New App. Production requires contract signing and billing info. Approval within 72 hours for first app.

steps: Sign in and go to My Self-Service Workspace
Receive API key and API secret automatically
registration_details.production_requirements: Contract signing, billing information, 72-hour approval for first app
registration_details.rate_limits: Free monthly request quota in both test and production

duffel-flights.test_output: Error: Failed to connect to MCP server: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'flights-mcp'
duffel-flights.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 15 states: 'API Key: Requires DUFFEL_API_KEY environment variable'. Line 206 provides registration URL.
duffel-flights.notes: Requires DUFFEL_API_KEY. Free tier available for limited bookings. Test mode (sandbox) with unlimited Duffel Balance for testing. Pay-per-booking model for production. Signup at https://app.duffel.com/ takes ~1 minute. MCP server command 'flights-mcp' not found - may need Python MCP server installation.

steps: Use 'Developer test mode' for sandbox testing
registration_details.test_mode: Unlimited Duffel Balance in sandbox, risk-free testing, no real bookings
registration_details.pricing_model: Pay-per-booking (charges only for confirmed bookings). Scales with volume.
registration_details.free_tier_details: Free tier for limited bookings. Test mode is completely free with unlimited sandbox balance.

eventbrite.test_output: Error: EVENTBRITE_API_KEY environment variable is required. npx @ibraheem4/eventbrite-mcp requires API key.
eventbrite.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 15 states: 'API Key: Requires EVENTBRITE_API_KEY environment variable'. MCP server error confirms requirement.
eventbrite.notes: Requires EVENTBRITE_API_KEY. Free tier available with rate limits. Register at Eventbrite Platform. OAuth 2.0 authorization. Rate limit: 1000 calls/hour, 48,000 calls/day.

steps: Go to Account Settings > Developer Links > API Keys
Receive email when API key is approved

weather.test_output: OpenMeteo API Error: Invalid request parameters
weather.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 16 states: 'API Key: Optional (NCEI token for enhanced climate normals)'. Uses NOAA (US) and Open-Meteo (global) APIs.
weather.notes: No API key required for basic functionality. Uses free NOAA API (US) and Open-Meteo API (global). Optional NCEI token enhances climate normals data. Test failed due to invalid parameters, not API key issue. 12 tools available including forecast, current conditions, alerts, air quality, etc.

yelp.test_output: Error: Failed to connect to MCP server: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'mcp-yelp-agent'
yelp.documentation_analysis: SKILL.md line 15 states: 'API Key: Requires YELP_API_KEY environment variable'. Line 172 provides registration URL.
yelp.notes: Requires YELP_API_KEY. NO permanent free tier as of 2024-2026. Only 30-day free trial with 5,000 API calls for evaluation. After trial, paid plans required: Starter ($7.99/1K calls), Plus ($9.99/1K), Enterprise ($14.99/1K). Paid plans include 30,000 calls/month with 5,000 daily limit. MCP server 'mcp-yelp-agent' not found - requires Python MCP installation.

steps: Generate API credentials from developer account
registration_details.free_trial: 30 days, 5,000 API calls (evaluation only, not commercial)
registration_details.transition_note: Yelp ended free access in 2024, all accounts converted to paid model

immediate_usable_without_setup.reason: No API key required, uses free NOAA and Open-Meteo APIs

easy_free_setup.reason: Free tier with self-service registration, API keys generated instantly
Free tier with straightforward OAuth 2.0 registration
Free sandbox mode, 1-minute signup, unlimited test balance

limited_free_trial_only.reason: 30-day trial (5,000 calls), then requires paid subscription

special_considerations.note: Uses web scraping (robots.txt may block). Legal/ethical considerations. No API key but may need --ignore-robots-txt flag.
China mainland railways only. Requires Node.js/npx installation. No API key needed.

mcp_server_setup_needed.requirement: Install Node.js and run via npx -y 12306-mcp

priority_high.action: Decide if 30-day trial is sufficient, or budget for paid API access ($7.99+/1K calls)
priority_high.decision_point: Commercial use requires paid subscription after trial

priority_medium.action: Register for free API keys to enable full functionality

priority_low.action: Install missing MCP server dependencies (Node.js/Python packages)
priority_low.impact: Required for any testing of these skills

priority_low.action: Review robots.txt compliance and legal implications of web scraping

testing_notes.methodology: Combined SKILL.md documentation analysis, runtime testing where possible, and web research for 2026 API registration procedures
limitations: Some MCP servers not installed/available for runtime testing
Test parameters may have been incorrect for some services
Network/service availability issues may affect results
testing_notes.confidence_level: High for API key requirements (confirmed via documentation and error messages), Medium for pricing details (based on web research current as of 2026-01-30)
